message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL 

This paper discusses the development of international standards for lexicon formats and their adequacy for lexicon management and lexicon-driven applications. This topic falls under the sub-category of computational linguistics (cs.CL) as it deals with the management and processing of natural language data. Additionally, the paper mentions the use of XML formats, which is relevant to information retrieval (cs.IR) and machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL) as well.
